// src/services/authService.js
import api from"./api";/**
 * Login with userid & password
 * Backend returns JWT token
 */export const login=async(userid,password)=>{const res=await api.post("/auth/login",{userid,password});return res.data;};/**
 * Get current logged-in user
 */export const getMe=async()=>{const res=await api.get("/auth/me");return res.data;};/**
 * Server-side logout (best effort)
 * Frontend state cleanup is handled by AuthContext
 */export const logout=async()=>{try{// optional: backend may or may not implement this
await api.post("/auth/logout");}catch(_unused){// ignore – backend may be restarting
}};/**
 * Refresh JWT token
 * Used by AuthContext timer
 */export const refreshToken=async()=>{const res=await api.post("/auth/refresh");return res.data;};
